H0.text: The English Football Association banned (What?) from 1921 to 1971 at its member clubs. Professional Football Matches on Sundays

H1.text: The English Football Association banned (What?) from 1921 to 1971 at its member clubs. International Friendlies

H2.text: The English Football Association banned (What?) from 1921 to 1971 at its member clubs. Youth Football Tournaments

H3.text: The English Football Association banned (What?) from 1921 to 1971 at its member clubs. Women's Football games

A4.text: In 1921, the Football Association banned all women's teams from playing on Association-affiliated grounds, arguing that the game is 'not fitted for females', citing the high costs of player expenses, and alleging financial corruption.
